info: The Weimar Republic is an unofficial historical designation for the German state from 1918 to 1933. The name derives from the city of Weimar, where its constitutional assembly first took place. The official name of the state remained Deutsches Reich, unchanged since 1871. In English, the country was usually known simply as Germany.
name: Weimar Republic
fun_fact: Weimar Germany Ended After Hitler Seized Emergency Power
